casebody.data:
VAUGHAN
v.
DARE & CURRITUCK DSS, et al. No. 272P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 6, 2015. Susan Vaughan, Kill Devil Hills, for Susan Vaughan. Courtney S. Hull, for Kathlyn Romm, Samantha Hurd, Kristen Harris, Currituck DSS. Christen DeGabrielle Simmons, Assistant District Attorney. Daniel Donahue.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of August 2015 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of August 2015."
